title: Equation for Revenue
text: Revenue is the amount of money a company brings in. In this case, the revenue can be found by multiplying the price per subscription times the number of subscribers, or quantity. We can introduce variables, $$p$$ for price per subscription and Q for quantity, giving us the equation $$Revenue=pQ$$.

title: Finding a Relationship Between Variables
